message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $850000. This is a great starting point, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you're offering.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $700000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $775000. This is a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair price for this exceptional product.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $775000. I'm willing to compromise and offer $725000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you're offering.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable going as low as $725000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $750000.
